entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `NotNullIfNotNull` does not flow when using delegates as method groups. #67288
  • Incorrect error message when accessing private protected class members from a friend assembly outside of derived class when using unsigned assemblies #67285
  • Compiler erroneously allows pointer to be used within a type-argument in a using-alias #67281
  • Missing type arguments on method invocation with more than one type parameter produce unexpected syntax tree #67277
  • Error squiggles do not appear for Compilation End analyzers in Full Solution Analysis mode #67276

Closed

  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Analyzers` should have `PrivateAssets="all"` #67274
  • How to create collapsible DiagnosticDescriptor? #67272

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove document from lsp misc workspace when it is found in normal workspace #67289
    Area-IDE
  • Do not use the Lsp-Misc workspace in VS scenarios #67287
    Area-IDE
  • Fix unimported completions show in places where they should not be #67283
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Disallow pointers inside generic type-arguments unless in an unsafe context (in C#12 and beyond). #67282
    Area-Compilers
  • Change the LOC target branch to 17.6 #67279
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Better parser error recovery when encountering a open generic name. #67278
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix up local/non-local diagnostic classification in analyzer driver #67275
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers

Merged

  • Add information to help us determine which misc workspace a file belongs to. #67286
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [Infra] Create -vs-deps branches #67284
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to features/CollectionLiterals #67280
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67290
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Initial binding and lowering of collection literals with single-valued elements #67025
  • Compute TextChange based on syntax instead of text #67120
    Area-IDE
  • Try add committed Suggestion item to completion MRU #64586
    Area-IDE
  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Move to one upstream ingestion feed #67263
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make Document Outline computation and update asynchronous. #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding (#64928)" #67082
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow missing placeholders and locals in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67092
    Area-Compilers
  • Delay ref safety analysis of placeholder replacements #67110
    Area-Compilers
  • Visit replacement expression before adding placeholder in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67155
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC telemetry improvements #67178
    Interactive-EnC
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Don't show expanded items when filter text length <2 #67049
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Analyzer driver fixes for span-based analysis #67255
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Implement support for captured Primary Constructor parameters in EE when portable PDB is used. #67266
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Rebuild fixes #67240
    Area-Compilers
